sense.gloss: beginning (of writing), opening passage (sentence, paragraph, etc.)

sdata.j: １ます↑空↑↓あ↓けて|↑書↑↓か↓き↑出↑↓だ↓し|なさい。
sdata.e: Begin to write, leaving one space blank.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はテキストを↑買↑↓か↓ってますが、↑流↑↓なが↓れてくる↑英文↑↓えいぶん↓をテキスト↑見↑↓み↓ずにまず|↑書↑↓か↓き↑出↑↓だ↓し|ています。
sdata.e: I buy the texts, but first I start writing the English sentences that come along without looking at them.

sdata.j: ↑玩具↑↓おもちゃ↓も、↑何↑↓なに↓も↑無↑↓な↓いから、↑私↑↓わたし↓は、チョークを↑買↑↓か↓ってもらって、それで、↑押入↑↓おしいれ↓の↑板戸↑↓いたど↓へ、↑絵↑↓え↓や、↑字↑↓じ↓を|↑書↑↓か↓き↑出↑↓だ↓し|た
sdata.e: I had no toys or anything else, so I used a chalk that had been bought for me and drew pictures and letters on a closet door.
